SourceString: Oh, you're going super far away, aren't you.\nWell, I'll wait here then.
You have other business to attend to?\nPlease excuse me. I suppose I'll wait\nhere then.
I can't leave this country yet...\nI'll wait here, please hurry back!
Huh? Just where are you going!? I'm not\nleaving this spot! I'll be waiting for\nyou here!
Oi, oi! Where're you going!? I'll wait\nhere for ya, tell you what.
Do you have business on another continent?\nOkay, well I'll wait here for you.
Are you going to another continent? Hmm, if\nthat's the case, I will wait for you here.
Hmm, got some odd jobs on another continent?\nI'll wait ya here then.
Hey, you're going a hell of a long way,\naren't you. Fine, I'll be waiting for\nyou here.
I'll go with Big Brother HyÅ«za too...
Oh, I see! You are going to another\ncontinent! In that case, I shall await\nyour return here!
Ah? Are you going to be leaving? Uhh,\nshould I wait here.
I'm not going to leave from this continent...\nSo I'll wait here!
Wha? Another continent? Pass-pass! I pass\non that!! I'll wait here for ya!
Ah, if Mr. Duston stays, I will remain\nas well.
Ahh, you're going to go away? Really...\nI'll wait for ya to get back then.
Do you have other business? I can't\nneglect Liz. I will wait here.
Eh? Are you going somewhere for a while?\nI'm worried about King Bermud and his\narena so I'll stay here.
Oh my, you're leaving this place? Then\nI'll be waiting here.
